text: E Buru Tetaren Sanla6.22 Buru Tetaren Sanla: Yahudiyane yi burun donma lɛbɛn mi yi saxi naxan yi xii solofere sanli ito bun. E sariɲan kiina nde nan yi a ra. A mato Xɔrɔyaan 12.15 kui. raba sɛwani xi solofere, bayo Alatala bata Manga Asiriya bɔɲɛn masara a yi e mali Ala Batu Banxin wanli, Isirayilaa Ala.
